item.title: Blog Posts Archive
item.description: Explore Past OSCAL Blogs Packed With Expert Insights Discover a comprehensive archive of OSCAL blog posts featuring practical guidance, relevant updates, and in-depth analysis to support effective security compliance. These articles cover a range of topics suited for both newcomers and experienced practitioners in the field. Jump to read blogs from: 2025, 2023, 2021 2025 Demystifying Compliance Automation: A Studentâ€™s Perspective on the Continuous Compliance Framework May 27, 2025 -- Presented By: Chris Vermeulen, Principal Engineer, Container Solutions Ian Miell, Partner, Container Solutions -- Blog by: Marilyn Nguyen (NIST Pathways, IT Student Trainee) marilyn.
